CMakeLists.txt: This file is the CMake configuration for the MyImageBrowser project. It specifies the minimum CMake version, project name, C++ standard, and required Qt components. It also defines the executable target and links it with the Qt5 Widgets library.

main.cpp: This file contains the main application code for the MyImageBrowser project. It includes necessary Qt headers and defines the main function. The main function initializes the QApplication, sets up the main window with a QVBoxLayout, QLabel, and QPushButton. It connects the button's clicked signal to a lambda function that opens a QFileDialog to select an image file. If an image is selected, it is displayed in the QLabel. The method signature is: int main(int argc, char *argv[]).
